page.title: 12Religion around Langho
page.content: In the Wilpshire area the Anglicans and Methodists have thriving church communities . Roman Catholics , members of the United Reform Church , Baptist Church , Salvation Army , Jews and Moslems all travel out of this area to worship . In the Langho area , the Anglicans travel just past the Petre Arms to worship at St. Leonards . There is a considerable Roman Catholic community centred on St. Marys in York Lane . Baptists in the area worship in nearby Billinton and the Methodists have a chapel in Langho village . The influence of the christians is considerable , Sunday attendances are very good and the various denominations often work and act together .
